title: Drawing, early 19th century
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, gray and blue wash, graphite on wove paper
inscribed:
in pen and black ink, along right margin: Toelette [sic] di Marmo di S. M. Venuta di Carrara
in pen and black ink, in center between  upper and lower drawing: Scala di Palmi . . . di Genova
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Elevation and plan of a washstand with mirror.  On either side are two pedestals each with a ceramic vase and an amphora sitting on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, gray and blue wash, graphite on wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3847.
